AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Silverash
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Let your guard down. There are no traps in the conditions she offer. Well, you won't know even if there is one. SilverAsh, President of Karlan Trade CO., LTD, has signed the contract with Rhodes Island and is ready to join the field.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Skadi
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: She’s a bit out of her element, literally. Skadi, bounty hunter, has come with the tide to drown your enemies.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Specter
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Her madness is terrifying. Specter from the Abyssal Hunters is already done with her prayer and is now prowling the battlefield.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Thorns
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: He'll cooperate according to his own interpretation of the commands. Thorns, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, wastes not an ounce of energy, calculating each strike meticulously.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Surtr
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Hopefully she will make an exception for the Doctor. Rhodes Island Guard Operator Surtr, a person difficult to approach.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Blaze
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Please, it's okay to dial it down a bit… Blaze, Rhodes Island's most fired-up Operator, will spread her enthusiasm like a wildfire.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Chen
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: She's terrifying when she's mad, but you don't want to mess with her even when she's not. Ch'en, Special Inspection Unit Chief, L.G.D., is cooperating with Rhodes Island to fulfill the obligations outlined in her contract.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Cutter
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: The kitchen is more dangerous than the battlefield, and it would be best to not let her in the kitchen. Cutter, mercenary, will complete all tasks on the battlefield in a calm and disciplined manner.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Franka
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: This scorching thermite blade shall penetrate all defenses. Franka, Guard Operator of B.P.R.S. of Blacksteel, is waiting for your orders.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Frostleaf
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Try to become her beacon. Frostleaf, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, will obey all your orders.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Lappland
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Just pray. Pray that she will listen to your orders. Operator Lappland can't wait to slash apart the enemies in front of her.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Mousse
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: In a word, scratch. Mousse, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, thinks of her enemies as oversized scratching posts.
